decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations, comprising the erection of single storey rear and side extensions, would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class A of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class A. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations, comprising the erection of an L-shaped rear roof dormer, would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations, comprising the installation of 2 rooflights on the front roofslope, would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 4 - The operations consist of the use of 80 Spencer Road, Mitcham, CR4 1SH, to a small House in Multiple Occupation (HMO) under C4 Use Class, in that the residential unit is used by three to six unrelated people. The development constitutes permitted development within the meaning of Class L, of Part 3 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class L.

Condition : 5 - INFORMATIVE:
The owner/ manager must apply for a HMO License as per Housing Act 2004, Part 2 once works are done and the tenants are due to move.
description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPEMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF AN L-SHAPED REAR ROOF EXTENSION, INSTALLATION OF 2X ROOFLIGHTS ON THE FRONT ROOFSLOPE, SINGLE STOREY REAR AND SIDE EXTENSIONS AND CHANGE OF USE FROM DWELLINGHOUSE (CLASS C3) TO HMO (CLASS C4).
